-- Shortcut labels
-- Shortcut handling
Description in main language changed ... update description
Looking for: description in the language of the current user
Looking for: any translations (box on the button)
C: Create /new button
Q: Query button
M: Modify button
D: Delete button
T: Translation
Create mode
Query, Modify
Check for duplicate department (code)
GP Disabled (see department)
IF user_language <> sys_language AND 'Create mode' THEN WARNING
"Please write the description in the systemlanguage (%1)"
(where %1 is the code of the system language)

ExpSyntax.val: InStr ({1,10},'M')>0 AND {1,1}<>'Q' AND (VarMod ('{0,3}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{0,4}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{0,5}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{0,6}'VAR))

Text.val: Check for errors
No errors
Data has changed ... ask for confirmation
Data has not changed ... just exit

ExpSyntax.val: VarMod ('{6,3}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{6,4}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{6,5}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{6,6}'VAR)
